about_the_game:
Six Blow: Bullet Rain immerses you into an exhilarating world that combines the classic FPS experience with a unique card collection and tactical combat elements. Set in a Wild West-themed universe, this game challenges players to strategically wield their weapons and abilities to survive in a world teeming with dangerous dinosaurs.

Living Bullets with Cards
Your weapons are filled with living beings, personified as bullets, represented by cards in the game. Each card unveils the identities and unique effects of these living bullets, adding depth and excitement to every moment, allowing players to adapt their strategies accordingly.

Deckbuilding Strategy
The cards in your deck influence your weapons' accuracy percentage. Merge and strategically use these cards to increase the accuracy of your weapons, a critical component and key to your survival.

Wild West Adventure
The game successfully captures the atmosphere of the Wild West. From dark caves to desert towns, embark on an unforgettable journey while battling dinosaurs.

Co-op Multiplayer
Team up with friends to combat dinosaurs. Share your strategies and join forces to tackle challenging foes.

Endless Action
Play endlessly and put your skills to the test to see how far you can go in this action roguelike experience!

Six Blow: Bullet Rain offers a unique action roguelike experience with its living bullet-loaded weapons, Wild West ambiance, and card-based mechanics. Customize and use your bullets strategically to survive the relentless onslaught of dinosaurs. Begin your adventure now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, Russian, Turkish
